016package de.cuioss.uimodel.field.impl;
017
018import java.io.Serializable;
019import java.util.Objects;
020
021import de.cuioss.uimodel.field.TracedDynamicField;
022import lombok.EqualsAndHashCode;
023import lombok.ToString;
024
025/**
026 * Default implementation of the {@linkplain TracedDynamicField} interface.
027 *
028 * @author Eugen Fischer
029 * @param <T>
030 */
031@ToString
032@EqualsAndHashCode
033public class BaseTracedDynamicField<T extends Serializable> implements TracedDynamicField<T> {
034
035    private static final long serialVersionUID = -5393234651696267199L;
036
037    private final T defaultValue;
038
039    private final boolean editable;
040
041    private T currentValue;
042
043    /**
044     * Initialization of {@linkplain TracedDynamicField}
045     *
046     * @param initialValue  which should be stored
047     * @param fieldEditable define if value could be changed
048     */
049    public BaseTracedDynamicField(final T initialValue, final boolean fieldEditable) {
050        defaultValue = initialValue;
051        editable = fieldEditable;
052        resetValue();
053    }
054
055    @Override
056    public boolean isEditable() {
057        return editable;
058    }
059
060    @Override
061    public boolean isAvailable() {
062        return null != currentValue;
063    }
064
065    @Override
066    public T getValue() {
067        return currentValue;
068    }
069
070    @Override
071    public void setValue(final T newValue) {
072        currentValue = newValue;
073    }
074
075    @Override
076    public boolean isChanged() {
077        return !Objects.equals(defaultValue, currentValue);
078    }
079
080    @Override
081    public T resetValue() {
082        currentValue = defaultValue;
083        return currentValue;
084    }
085}
